ai-iti66:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti66:2.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these three kinds of purity.
ai-iti66:2.3_0: Purity of body, speech, and mind.
ai-iti66:2.4_0: These are the three kinds of purity.”
ai-iti66:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti66:3.4_0: they’ve given up everything, they say.”
ai-iti66:4.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
